translation.en: Tell him.
Yeah, I'm going to tell him.
Now.
Yeah, now.
I've been asking you to do this for months.
Why don't men ever assign tasks to their wives?
translation.ja: 妻にやらせちゃダメか？

translation.en: I'm not your wife, remember?
Technically, you are.
[scoffs] What's technically?
Well, if you're found dead under mysterious circumstances, I will be the prime suspect.
translation.ja: 君が変死したら 僕が第一容疑者だ

translation.en: Okay. You want me to tell an Indian male that he stinks?
translation.ja: 彼に“臭い”と 言えばいいの？

translation.en: Keep it down, Shruti.
They understand English. He just pretends.
translation.ja: 彼は英語が分かるんだ

translation.en: [sighs] All right, Arya. If you don't tell him, I'm going to sack him without a reason.
translation.ja: あなたが言わないなら 彼をクビにする

translation.en: Technically, the car comes under my department.
translation.ja: 車は僕のカネで払ってる

translation.en: You pay the EMI for the car, I pay for the drivers.
translation.ja: ローンはね でも運転手代は私が払ってる

translation.en: So "technically" he's my department.
translation.ja: でも運転手代は私が払ってる

translation.en: Just tell him.
You know, a man has different smells in different parts of his body.
translation.ja: 男は部位によって 臭いが変わる

translation.en: Which smell is exactly bothering you?
[whispering in Punjabi] If his nose worked as well as his dick, we wouldn't be in this situation.
translation.ja: 〈あなたの鼻が悪いから 口論に〉

translation.en: [in Tamil] When she has no comebacks she blabbers in Punjabi.
-[in English] What did you say? -What did you say?
-No, what did you say? -[Arya] Nothing.
I ask you for so little, Arya.
That sounds like marriage.
That's a great list of books you have right there,
translation.ja: 素晴らしい本ばかりですが

translation.en: but I noticed you forgot to mention Arya Iyer.
Arya who?
[woman] Arya Iyer, India's second highest selling novelist. After you, of course.
translation.ja: あなたに次いで ２番目に売れてる作家です

translation.en: Yeah, I think one of his books did sell a few copies.
translation.ja: 確かに売れた本もありますが

translation.en: But your question to me was books worth reading. So…
translation.ja: 読む価値があるかと 聞かれると…

translation.en: [woman laughs] Okay, let's talk about your recent book.
translation.ja: では あなたの最新作の話を

translation.en: Where's your investor?
He's at the bookstore. I think it's this way.
translation.ja: 書店にいる　こっちよ

translation.en: I don't like him.
You've never even met him.
Yeah, but I know the type.
The ones who make elaborate plans to surprise their wives only when others are watching.
translation.ja: 他人の前でだけ 愛妻家を演じるヤツだ

translation.en: [scoffs] You know, there are some sweet men in this world, Arya. Get used to it.
translation.ja: 世の中には 優しい男性もいるの

translation.en: Actually, if you'd done those little things, maybe you'd still have a marriage.
translation.ja: あなたも見習えば よかったのに

translation.en: That's not what went wrong with our marriage.
So what went wrong with our marriage, Arya?
translation.ja: じゃ 何が原因なの？

translation.en: [chuckles] That's what we're trying to figure out for the past three years.
translation.ja: それを３年間 考えてる

translation.en: Maybe nothing went wrong.
Maybe marriage is only for people with no other choice. Nobody else will have them so they're stuck together.
translation.ja: 結婚は他に選択肢がない者が 仕方なくするものだ

translation.en: Maybe we're too happening to be stuck in a never-ending marriage.
translation.ja: 僕たちも偶然 一緒にいる

translation.en: So we live in the same house to fool our daughter into thinking that her parents are together.
translation.ja: 同居は続けて 娘には内緒にするのよね？

translation.en: How are we "happening," Arya?
Well, we have a home. We have a beautiful daughter.
translation.ja: だって家もあるし 娘もいる

translation.en: Over a period of time, we've become good friends. And who knows, we might even sleep together.
translation.ja: 僕たちは いい友人だし セックスもするかも

translation.en: -Never. -Hey.
Never ever.
A couple never really knows when they've had sex for the very last time.
translation.ja: 最後にヤったのは いつだろうな

translation.en: -Look at you. -[Shruti] Ah. -Such a lovely pair. -[Shruti chuckles]
translation.ja: おやおや　ステキなご夫婦だ

translation.en: There's so much love.
You know, I have this instinct for couples who have this magic still on.
translation.ja: 愛が続く夫婦を見抜くのは 得意なんだ

translation.en: Wow. Your instincts are spot on, man.
-Everybody says that. -They do, huh?
-Arya, this is Mahesh. -Hi, Mahesh.
translation.ja: マヘシュよ よろしく

translation.en: Thank you so much for doing this.
I'm doing this for her. I believe you're really important for her business.
[Mahesh laughs] Really important.
-Twenty five percent of her revenues. -Yes.
I'm glad I'm doing it then.
Oh, my wife's a big fan of yours.
-She's read all your books. -How about you? Have you read any?
translation.ja: 妻は君の大ファンだ あなたは？

translation.en: -[Mahesh] Um… -He's kidding.
So what are we doing? I have a flight to catch in an hour.
translation.ja: 段取りは？　時間がない

translation.en: Yes, yes, so this is the plan. My wife's book club meeting is happening inside.
translation.ja: 計画はこうだ 妻は読書会に参加してる

translation.en: There she is in green.
They're discussing your book and bam, surprise.
translation.ja: 君の本の話を してるところに… サプライズ

translation.en: You'll appear and wish her happy birthday.
translation.ja: 君が登場し お祝いを

translation.en: Voilà.
-[Mahesh] Let's do this. -Yeah.
How original.
The way he portrays his female characters, that's what I find amazing.
translation.ja: “働く女性の読書会” “働く女性の読書会” 女性の描き方が素晴らしいの 女性の描き方が素晴らしいの

translation.en: And the way he describes the insides of an urban marriage.
translation.ja: 都会の夫婦の実情の描写もね

translation.en: He's just so accurate.
[Basu] Geeta, Geeta, hang on.
I thought we were discussing Amartya Sen.
translation.ja: 議題は アマルティア･センかと

translation.en: Um, we wanted a break from the serious stuff, Dr. Basu.
Didn't you get an e-mail?
No, I didn't get any e-mail.
And in any case, your book club treats its male members as second class citizens even though they are feminists.
translation.ja: 君の読書会では 男性が不当に扱われている

translation.en: Um, I'm so sorry about that, Dr. Basu.
Have you read this novel?
No, I don't read such books.
Uh, Dr. Basu, please join us. Now you're already here.
translation.ja: せっかくだから参加して

translation.en: -Sit. -Well…
-[Geeta] Hi, Golu. How are you? -Fine, Aunty.
translation.ja: ゴル 元気？ 元気だよ

translation.en: Papa?
-[woman] Arya. -Hi, Geeta.
-[gasps] -Happy birthday.
My God. Oh, my God!
Happy birthday, my darling.
[Geeta] Thank you.
-How do you do these things? -You like it?
Like it? I love it. I mean, this is the best surprise ever. [Mahesh] Come here, give me a hug.
translation.ja: 最高よ 人生で一番のサプライズだわ

translation.en: So how long have you been married?
-Twelve years. -Yes.
Wow. So what do you do for sex? [chuckles]
Anyway, it was really nice meeting y'all.
translation.ja: お祝いできてよかった

translation.en: Uh, and happy birthday again. I have a flight to catch.
translation.ja: 僕は もう行かないと

translation.en: What? No, you've just come. We have so many questions for you, Arya.
translation.ja: 来たばかりよ 話を聞きたいわ

translation.en: -We can't let you leave. Please. -I'm in a little bit of a hurry.
translation.ja: お願い 時間がない

translation.en: No way. You have to stay here
and you have to read from your latest book.
It's my birthday. Come on.
There we go.
"Thousands and thousands of windows, and behind every window is a shit marriage."
translation.ja: “多くの窓の向こうで 結婚生活が送られている”

translation.en: "And amongst these marriages, the worst kind are the ones that are stuck
translation.ja: “中でも最悪なのは” “幸福度が中途半端な 結婚生活だ”

translation.en: right in the middle of the shit scale."
translation.ja: “幸福度が中途半端な 結婚生活だ”

translation.en: "No joy, yet not enough reason to break up."
translation.ja: “幸せではないが 離婚する理由がない”

translation.en: "Therefore, some couples are much luckier than they think."
translation.ja: “不幸な夫婦は 実は幸運なのだ”

translation.en: "At least they have a good enough reason to end their misery."
translation.ja: “悲劇を終える理由が 明確なのだから”

translation.en: Is the passage over?
I guess now it is. [chuckles]
Are those my books?
Do you have a Nobel Prize in economics?
Thankfully not. [chuckles]
That won't be good for the business of a pulp fiction writer.
Well, then I'm afraid these are not your books.
translation.ja: では これは他人の本だ

translation.en: Don't I look familiar to you?
We're neighbors. We moved in only last month.
translation.ja: 隣人だ　先月入居した

translation.en: Oh, hi. Sorry.
-Papa, I want to meet him. -Yeah…
Uh, he's my son, Gollu. Big fan.
-Hi, Gollu. -[in Hindi] Go.
[in English] He's a fan.
Hi.
Uh, can you step out for a second, please?
What?
I don't shake the hand of teenage boys.
But why?
It's a policy.
Look, pardon me for saying this. I'm a political economist. I write policies every day. Never heard of such a policy.
translation.ja: 私は政治経済学者だが そんな政策(ポリシー)は知らない

translation.en: Let's just say it's a phobia.
Why can't you shake the hand of a boy?
At this stage in their lives, uh, their hands are busy doing stuff, you know.
translation.ja: あの年頃は よくオナニーをするだろ

translation.en: Which I don't have a problem with. That's fine. But, uh…
translation.ja: それは別にいいんだが…

translation.en: they don't wash after.
But he's just 14.
[in Hindi] Let's go, Ganesh.
[in English] Hey, do you even know where I'm going?
translation.ja: 行き先を聞かないのか？

translation.en: Fuck. It's come to this.
-Where are you going? -Mumbai.
translation.ja: どこへ？ ムンバイだ

translation.en: What for?
-Now you're just faffing. -No, I really want to know.
translation.ja: 無理してる 知りたいの

translation.en: Netflix wants to meet.
-They want the film rights of my latest. -Oh, wow. That's a big meeting.
translation.ja: NETFLIXとの打ち合わせだ すごいじゃない

translation.en: -[Arya] Yeah. -Don't let them jip you, okay?
You want me to negotiate?
I'll manage. Thank you.
translation.ja: 大丈夫　ありがとう

translation.en: -I'll see you in a couple of days. -Yeah.
Hey, listen, listen.
I'm changing my Facebook status. The relationship status.
translation.ja: ＳＮＳの交際ステータスを 変えたいの

translation.en: I'm making it single.
Shruti, we had decided to keep it quiet till we know how Rohini is going to react.
translation.ja: ローヒニーに話すまで 公表は控えると

translation.en: But it is all quiet. I mean, nobody's really going to notice.
translation.ja: 誰も気づきやしないわ

translation.en: Why are you doing it?
'Cause it's a first step, and I need a first step.
translation.ja: 新しい一歩を踏み出したい

translation.en: When do you plan to do it?
Let's see.
[in Hindi] Let's go, Ganesh.
-[in Hindi] Hello. -[guard] Hello.
-[Arya in Hindi] What are you doing? -Checking your ticket.
-But why? -This is my duty.
How do you know this is not a fake ticket?
-Is it fake? -No, I'm saying…
Your seniors are just wasting your time.
-They made you wear this dress-- -Mister.
translation.ja: 〈そんな服で…〉 〈これは制服だ 国のために働いてる〉

translation.en: Does this look like a dress? This is a uniform. We get it to serve the country.
translation.ja: 〈これは制服だ 国のために働いてる〉

translation.en: No, you are serving the country,
but people in your village are thinking you're in this uniform fighting dangerous terrorists in Kashmir.
translation.ja: 〈だが 戦場でテロリストと 戦ってると思われてるのに〉

translation.en: But you're standing here and checking tickets.
translation.ja: 〈チケット確認の 任務なんて〉

translation.en: [man in English] Why are you insulting a soldier?
This guy's insulting a soldier.
No, I'm not insulting a soldier.
[in Hindi] Get out of the line.
-What did I do? -[guard] Get out of the line.
Get out.
[in English] Gate number four. Gate number four.
Gate number four.
-[cell phone chimes] -[Arya] Notes from the field.
There's a man here who's looking at mobile screens trying to check tickets.
translation.ja: チケットを確認している 男がいるが

translation.en: He has no machine here that can validate the authenticity of those tickets.
translation.ja: 機械も使わず 見分けられるものか

translation.en: But he's here doing a boring job.
Hey! Hello.
Who are you calling boring? He's a soldier.
He's not from the army, you ignorant moron!
translation.ja: 黙れ　無知なバカめ

translation.en: Hello, you, mister…
You better mind your language. I know what moron means.
translation.ja: バカとは何て言い草だ

translation.en: And yet he doesn't have a problem with the word ignorant.
[man in Hindi] If he's not from the army, is he from the navy?
Okay, tell me the full form of the CISF.
[in English] Don't act smart, you anti-national.
Okay. What language is our national anthem in?
-Sanskrit. -[Arya] No.
-[man] Hindi. -No.
Okay, Malayali.
And this moron thinks Malayali is a language.
translation.ja: マラヤーラム語なんて 言語じゃない

translation.en: [in Hindi] You will not get entry from any gate.
[in English] Ma'am, please come here.
Ma'am, please come. Ma'am.
translation.ja: こちらへ来てください

translation.en: [Arya] Oh, there you are.
-I'm very sorry, sir. -It's all right.
We're trying to figure out what has happened. Did you create some trouble?
translation.ja: 事情をお伺いします 何をしたんです？

translation.en: I didn't create any trouble. I didn't say anything to anybody.
In fact, my flight is in the next 40 minutes.
Security has a major concern.
You can't fly to Mumbai today, sir. I'm sorry. We're putting you on the No Fly List.
translation.ja: ムンバイ行きの便への搭乗を 拒否します

translation.en: No Fly?
Ah, you haven't left?
My-my-my-my flight got canceled.
translation.ja: その… キャンセルになった

translation.en: [Shruti over phone] Oh. So now?
So you free for dinner?
Okay.
[woman in Vietnamese] Hello.
translation.ja: “クラブ･ベトナム” 〈こんばんは〉

translation.en: Hello.
Hello.
[in English] Oh, hi. Are you from Mizoram?
-Meghalaya, sir. -Ah.
They put you up in this fancy dress costume and pass you off as somebody from Vietnam.
translation.ja: ベトナム人のように 仕立てられてるが

translation.en: -Are you okay with this? -Hmm.
-Yes, sir. -Does it not bother you at all?
-No, sir. -Just a wee bit?
Yes, a bit.
[man] Welcome, sir.
[in Vietnamese] Hello.
[in English] Sin, definitely it is.
translation.ja: 罪(シン)か　そのとおりだ

translation.en: Where's my wife?
Sir, she's there.
Oh, my God. Arya. I'm a big fan. Like, a big, big fan.
translation.ja: アーリヤ？　大ファンなの

translation.en: Oh. So do you work here?
Oh. No. I'm a professional photographer with Lifecatchers.
translation.ja: ライフキャッチャーズ社の 写真家よ

translation.en: What's Lifecatchers?
[woman] Oh. You don't know Lifecatchers?
-Isn't that what I just said? -[woman] Sorry.
translation.ja: そう言った ごめんなさい

translation.en: So we capture the most important moments of our clients' lives.
translation.ja: 大切な瞬間を写真に収めるの

translation.en: -Wow. -What the fuck are you doing?
Am I paying you to chat?
Focus.
-That's our client. -A very pissed one apparently.
translation.ja: 依頼人よ イラついてたな

translation.en: Yeah, he's pretty nervous. He's gonna propose to that woman.
translation.ja: プロポーズするから 緊張してるの

translation.en: He wants us to capture the moment when she finds the ring. Hopefully she screams and cries.
translation.ja: 指輪を見つけて喜ぶ姿を 撮るよう依頼されてる

translation.en: And where's the ring?
[whispers] It's going to be in the dessert.
Oh. How original.
So you need to act accordingly. You can't be in your comfort zone.
translation.ja: 行動すべきだ 自分の殻を破らねばならない

translation.en: You will have to go out.
translation.ja: 自分の殻を破らねばならない

translation.en: [man] That's absolutely right.
You'll have to expand your horizon.
It's like we're in a world where beauty is often with the beast.
translation.ja: 美女が野獣に惹(ひ)かれる 世の中だしな

translation.en: Hey, thanks for the cushion.
[Shruti] Your back needs it more than mine.
[Arya] That's very considerate.
Hey, Shruti. Do you see the couple behind me?
translation.ja: 後ろにカップルがいるだろ

translation.en: That man is going to propose to the lady tonight.
translation.ja: 今夜 プロポーズするらしい

translation.en: -She totally knows he's going to propose. -[Arya] How do you know that?
translation.ja: 彼女も分かってる なぜ？

translation.en: Look at her.
Every fucking thing about her says he's going to get sex every single night.
translation.ja: 毎晩 彼とセックスすると 彼女の全てが物語ってる

translation.en: Food and sex and food and sex. And that's going to be the story of their lives.
translation.ja: 食事とセックスを繰り返す 人生を送るの

translation.en: Hello. You're making it very obvious.
translation.ja: ちょっと　見すぎよ

translation.en: Yeah, well, what do I care? I don't like guys like him in the first place,
translation.ja: ああいうタイプの男は嫌いだ

translation.en: who make this grand gesture of proposing. You know, it's never about the girl. It's all about themselves.
translation.ja: 派手なプロポーズなんて 自己満足に浸りたいだけだ

translation.en: "Oh, look. Such a nice guy I am."
translation.ja: “僕は なんて優しいんだ”

translation.en: "I'm spending so much money on this moment and this is how much I loved her." Bullshit.
translation.ja: “大金をはたくほど 彼女を愛してる”

translation.en: You know, when I was his age, most of the girls I was interested in didn't even know that.
translation.ja: 僕が若い頃は あんな男はいなかった

translation.en: I know.
No, seriously. My generation was never about the show.
translation.ja: 僕の世代は ヘタな演出をしない

translation.en: We spent hours and hours trying to get the girl, get this, happy.
translation.ja: じっくり時間をかけ 女性を幸せにした

translation.en: No, seriously. Look…
No, seriously. Look…
Son of a bitch.
Hey, um…
Can you order? I'll just be back.
-Uh, what do you… What? -[Arya] The usual.
[in Hindi] Why are you standing? Sit down.
[man in English] This is the bathroom.
translation.ja: トイレだよ　いいの？

translation.en: Hi.
Hi.
You too write well.
But you use difficult words like "furtive" and…
translation.ja: 難しい言葉が多い “隠匿”とか…

translation.en: -Inadequate? -Uh…
-All the best. -My apologies.
translation.ja: 頑張って 悪かった

translation.en: [Arya] So how have you been?
I've been good. What's up with you?
All good. Uh, Netflix may be buying my books. Maybe all of them.
translation.ja: NETFLIXが本の映画化権を 買うかも

translation.en: -Nice. -How about you?
translation.ja: よかった そっちは？

translation.en: They can't afford me.
Hey, so I have an outrageous request.
I'm here with my wife for dinner, and I was wondering if you could come over to my table and say something.
translation.ja: 妻と食事をしてるから ファンのフリをしてくれ

translation.en: Something fan-like, so I can get some brownie points with my wife.
translation.ja: 妻と食事をしてるから ファンのフリをしてくれ 妻の点数を稼ぎたい

translation.en: That's sweet. Yeah, I'll do it.
Oh, you'll do it?
Yeah, such a small thing.
You run along, I'll join you guys.
That's very kind of you. Thank you.
translation.ja: ありがとう　またあとで

translation.en: -So I'll see you around. -Yeah, see you around.
-[man] Chetan? -[in Hindi] Yes?
translation.ja: チェータン？ ええ　何です？

translation.en: -[in English] Oh. Selfie? Huh. -Check this.
[man over video] This guy is insulting a soldier.
translation.ja: これを 〈そんな服を 着させられて…〉

translation.en: [Arya in Hindi] They made you wear this dress--
translation.ja: 〈そんな服を 着させられて…〉

translation.en: [guard] Mister! You think this is a dress? This is a uniform. We get it to serve the country.
translation.ja: 〈これは制服だ 国のために働いてる〉

translation.en: No, you are serving the country.
In India, we should have compulsory military training.
translation.ja: 〈インドも 兵役を義務化すべきだ〉

translation.en: -[in English] Just like the Israelis. -Exactly.
translation.ja: 〈インドも 兵役を義務化すべきだ〉 〈同じことを友達に言ったら 笑われた〉

translation.en: [in Hindi] I say the same thing to my friends, but they laugh at me.
translation.ja: 〈同じことを友達に言ったら 笑われた〉

translation.en: [man] He is absolutely correct.
[in English] The middle class in this country these days is so anti-intellectual.
translation.ja: 最近の中流階級は 反知性主義的だ

translation.en: Semi-literates.
Semi-literates.
Hey, so what did I miss?
[Shruti] She just cried.
Oh, shit. That mean they're gonna cancel the dessert?
translation.ja: デザートはキャンセルか？

translation.en: No. It's a happy cry.
"Vicky, life is just so perfect in this moment."
"Vicky, I could die in your arms." "I could die in your arms tonight." Kind of a thing.
translation.ja: “今夜 あなたの腕の中で 死んでもいい”ってね

translation.en: Two coconut chocolate ice creams, please.
And the moment has arrived.
[Arya] Just check out the size of this table. Where the hell is he going to keep the food?
translation.ja: このテーブル 狭すぎないか

translation.en: -On top of that, this huge flower-- -Let them be. They're pretty.
translation.ja: 花もデカいし… 置いておいて

translation.en: You know why women like flowers?
[Shruti] Why?
Because flowers are vaginas.
Then you should like them, no?
-[hesitates] See the bees-- -[Chetan] Arya?
translation.ja: 例えばハチが… アーリヤ？

translation.en: Oh, man, I read your book. It was so good. So good to see you here, man.
translation.ja: 君の本を読んだ 会えてうれしいよ

translation.en: One selfie, you and me?
What are you doing, Chetan?
Where are your manners?
Where's your decency, man?
I'm having a private moment with my wife.
translation.ja: プライベートの時間だ

translation.en: Can we do this later, please?
Run along. Go on.
Some people just don't get it.
What the fuck was that, Arya?
-[Arya] Why? -What just happened?
translation.ja: 何が？ 今のはどういうこと？

translation.en: What got into you?
[Arya] I wanna have a private time with you. This is important for me.
translation.ja: 君との時間を 大切にしたいんだ

translation.en: -Oh. Since when? -[cell phone chiming]
Come on. It's always meant a great deal to me. What's wrong with you, Shruti? I'm so offended.
translation.ja: 昔から そうじゃないか どうしちまったんだ

translation.en: [woman] Oh, shit!
What are you guys doing? What are you doing?
Hey, boss, we came here for a quiet dinner.
translation.ja: 静かに食事したいんだ

translation.en: -Not to see some guy do his peacock dance. -Arya--
translation.ja: ダンスなんて見たくない

translation.en: No, seriously. And you know what?
translation.ja: ダンスなんて見たくない 最悪なのは お前がイケメンなことだ

translation.en: The worst part is, this is not even about you. It's about how cute he is.
translation.ja: 最悪なのは お前がイケメンなことだ

translation.en: It's phoney guys like him who have ruined the lives of honest men who don't want to do shit like this.
translation.ja: お前のような男のせいで 誠実な男が損をする

translation.en: You are one asshole fellow!
[in Hindi] He ruined the proposal. My little brother was working on this for a whole week.
translation.ja: 〈弟のプロポーズが 台なしだ〉

translation.en: [in English] You brought your entire family to watch this drama? -He brought his-- -Arya, please.
translation.ja: 家族も見学に来てたのか？

translation.en: He is my brother and nephew.
Oh, how considerate. I know people like you.
You're the kind of guy who will take his parents to the honeymoon. -You sure you want to marry this buffoon? -[man] Sir…
translation.ja: 新婚旅行に 両親も連れてく気なんだろ

translation.en: -Yes. -You're disturbing everyone.
I'm disturbing everyone? Have you seen these grown men in costumes?
translation.ja: 僕が迷惑なら こいつらは？

translation.en: [man] Sir, this is their job. This is what they do.
translation.ja: これが彼らの仕事です

translation.en: [Arya] I'm not talking about their jobs. But why'd you have to make them look like fools?
translation.ja: こんな演奏 バカみたいだ

translation.en: Whom are you calling fools? We are just playing our set.
Not you, brother. I'm saying he's making you look like--
translation.ja: そうじゃなくて… 演奏料はもらう

translation.en: -Sir, we'll take full payment for this. -[Arya] You should--
[screams] Harry!
[in Hindi] He spoiled my moment.
He is a traitor!
-[man 1] Fucker! -[man 2] Hold his hand.
Hey, hold on.
Come on, Professor. These types of people behave better after two slaps.
[Basu] No, Mr. Singh.
We are from Gandhi's country. Violence is wrong.
translation.ja: 〈ガンディーの国で 暴力は許されない〉

translation.en: [in English] Wait, wait, wait. Uh…
Let the youngest amongst you reach out to this man for peace.
translation.ja: 最年少の少年と 友好を示してもらおう

translation.en: -[in Punjabi] What's your name, dear? -Satvinder.
Yes, Satvinder.
[In Hindi] Give your hand to Uncle.
Shake his hand, dear.
Shake it.
[in English] What are you waiting for? Shake his hand.
At this stage in their lives, they're hands are busy doing stuff.
translation.ja: あの年頃は よくオナニーをするだろ

translation.en: [in English] Arya, shake his hand.
translation.ja: あの年頃は よくオナニーをするだろ 握手して

translation.en: Come on, man. Shake his hand.
They don't wash after.
[man 3 in Hindi] What are you looking at? Shake his hand.
[in English] Come on, man. Shake his hand.
